sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS UnmatchedRecordCount
FROM integration.Import_Constituents
WHERE ISNULL(MatchAttempted,0) = 0
AND ConstituentId IS NULL
AND TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
AND IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
AND ADFPipelineName = '@{pipeline().parameters.CallingPipelineName}'
AND ADFPipelineRunId = '@{pipeline().parameters.CallingPipelineRunId}'

AND IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
AND ADFPipelineName = '@{pipeline().parameters.CallingPipelineName}'
AND ADFPipelineRunId = '@{pipeline().parameters.CallingPipelineRunId}'

scriptLines: derivedCampaign derive(IsActive = case({Un-contactable (Gone Away)}=="Member is un-contactable" || Deceased=="Yes",0),
OkToEmail = case({Charity Marketing - Email}=="Opt Out", 0, {Charity Marketing - Email}=="Opt In",1),
OkToMail = case({Charity Marketing - Letter}=="Opt Out", 0, {Charity Marketing - Letter}=="Opt In",1),
OKToPhone = case({Charity Marketing - Home Telephone} =="Opt Out", 0, {Charity Marketing - Home Telephone}=="Opt In",1),
OKToSMS = case({Charity Marketing - SMS} =="Opt Out", 0, {Charity Marketing - SMS}=="Opt In",1),

ContactChannelDetails = case(!(isNull({E-mail}) || trim({E-mail}) == '') && {Charity Marketing - Email} == 'Opt In' ,'Email',!(isNull(Postcode) || trim(Postcode) == '') && {Charity Marketing - Letter} != 'Opt Out' ,'Mail',!(isNull(Phone) || trim(Phone) == '') && {Charity Marketing - Home Telephone} == 'Opt In' ,'Phone',!(isNull(Mobile) ||trim(Mobile) == '') && {Charity Marketing - Mobile} == 'Opt In' ,'Phone','')) ~> uknownPurposeDerivedColumn
Date1 = iif(isDate({Earliest Draw}, 'dd/MM/yyyy'), toDate({Earliest Draw},'dd/MM/yyyy'), toDate(null(),'dd/MM/yyyy')),
SourceCode=="Unity4 Acquisition","Lottery Income - UN4 Sign Up",
derivedTransactionColumns filter(toDecimal({Total Payment Amount}) > toDecimal({Lottery Payment Amount})) ~> filterDonationAmount
AllocationAmount = toDecimal({Total Payment Amount}) - toDecimal({Lottery Payment Amount})) ~> derivedTransactionDonationColumns
derivedCampaign derive(IsActive = case({Un-contactable (Gone Away)}=="Member is un-contactable" || Deceased=="Yes",0),
OkToEmail = case({Charity Marketing - Email}=="Opt Out", 0, {Charity Marketing - Email}=="Opt In",1),
OkToMail = case({Charity Marketing - Letter}=="Opt Out", 0, {Charity Marketing - Letter}=="Opt In",1),
OKToPhone = case({Charity Marketing - Home Telephone} =="Opt Out", 0, {Charity Marketing - Home Telephone}=="Opt In",1),
OKToSMS = case({Charity Marketing - SMS} =="Opt Out", 0, {Charity Marketing - SMS}=="Opt In",1),
SourceCode=="Unity4 Acquisition","Lottery Income - UN4 Sign Up",
derivedTransactionColumns filter(toDecimal({Total Payment Amount}) > toDecimal({Lottery Payment Amount})) ~> filterDonationAmount
AllocationAmount = toDecimal({Total Payment Amount}) - toDecimal({Lottery Payment Amount})) ~> derivedTransactionDonationColumns

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT lp.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryPurpose,
  lc.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryCampaign,
  lpr.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryProduct,
  kp.[Value] AS DonorfyKeyPrefix,
  dpr.[Value] AS DonorfyDonationProduct
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lp
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lc
  ON  lc.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND lc.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND lc.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryCampaign'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lpr
  ON  lpr.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND lpr.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND lpr.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryProduct'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dpr
  ON  dpr.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND dpr.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND dpr.[Key] = 'DonorfyDonationProduct'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] kp
  ON  kp.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND kp.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND kp.[Key] = 'DonorfyKeyPrefix'
  WHERE lp.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND lp.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND lp.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryPurpose'

SELECT dltc.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryTagCategory,
 dat.Value AS DonorfyLotteryActiveTag,
 dct.Value AS DonorfyLotteryCancelledTag,
 dlwt.Value AS DonorfyLotteryWinnerTag,
 dlset.Value AS DonorfyLotterySelfExcludeTag
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dltc
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dat 
  ON dat.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dat.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dat.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryActiveTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dct 
  ON dct.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dct.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dct.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryCancelledTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dlwt 
  ON dlwt.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dlwt.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dlwt.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryWinnerTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dlset 
  ON dlset.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dlset.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dlset.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotterySelfExcludeTag'
  WHERE dltc.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND dltc.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND dltc.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryTagCategory'

SELECT ddr.[Value] AS DonorfyDeceasedReason,
    dgar.[Value] AS DonorfyGoneAwayReason
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] ddr
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dgar 
  ON dgar.TenantCode = ddr.TenantCode
  AND dgar.IntegrationName = ddr.IntegrationName
  AND dgar.[Key] = 'DonorfyGoneAwayReason'
  WHERE ddr.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND ddr.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND ddr.[Key] = 'DonorfyDeceasedReason'

SELECT ba.[Value] AS DonorfyBankAccount,
    f.[Value] AS DonorfyFund,
    pm.[Value] As DonorfyDefaultPaymentMethod,
    dd.[Value] As DonorfyDepartment
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] ba
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] f 
  ON f.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND f.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND f.[Key] = 'DonorfyFund'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] pm 
  ON pm.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND pm.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND pm.[Key] = 'DonorfyDefaultPaymentMethod'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dd 
  ON dd.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND dd.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND dd.[Key] = 'DonorfyDepartment'
  WHERE ba.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND ba.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND ba.[Key] = 'DonorfyBankAccount'

SELECT dkst.[Value] AS DonorfyKeyStorageType,
    dksl.[Value] AS DonorfyKeyStorageLocation
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dkst
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dksl
  ON dksl.TenantCode = dkst.TenantCode
  AND dksl.IntegrationName = dkst.IntegrationName
  AND dksl.[Key] = 'DonorfyKeyStorageLocation'
  WHERE dkst.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND dkst.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND dkst.[Key] = 'DonorfyKeyStorageType'

SELECT un.[Value] AS APIUserName, ak.[Value] as APIAccessKey
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] un
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] ak
  ON ak.TenantCode = un.TenantCode
  AND ak.IntegrationName = un.IntegrationName
  AND ak.[Key] = 'APIAccessKey'
  WHERE un.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND un.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND un.[Key] = 'APIUserName'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT dm.[Value] AS DonorfyGADDeclarationMethod
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dm
  WHERE dm.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND dm.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND dm.[Key] = 'DonorfyGADDeclarationMethod'

SELECT (
SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM integration.Import_Constituents 
WHERE TRIM(ISNULL(ErrorMessage,'')) != ''
AND TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
AND IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
AND ADFPipelineName = '@{pipeline().Pipeline}'
AND ADFPipelineRunId = '@{pipeline().RunId}'
)
+ 
(
SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM integration.Import_Transactions 
WHERE TRIM(ISNULL(ErrorMessage,'')) != ''
AND TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
AND IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
AND ADFPipelineName = '@{pipeline().Pipeline}'
AND ADFPipelineRunId = '@{pipeline().RunId}'
)
+ 
(
SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM integration.Import_Activities 
WHERE TRIM(ISNULL(ErrorMessage,'')) != ''
AND TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
AND IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
AND ADFPipelineName = '@{pipeline().Pipeline}'
AND ADFPipelineRunId = '@{pipeline().RunId}'
)
AS ErrorCount

parameters.message: The load of Constituents, Activities or Transactions has completed with errors logged.  Please check the log files for the specific error messages.

  lc.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryCampaign,

  kp.[Value] AS DonorfyKeyPrefix
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lp
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lc
  ON  lc.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND lc.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName

  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lpr
  ON  lpr.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND lpr.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND lpr.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryProduct'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] kp

  AND kp.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND kp.[Key] = 'DonorfyKeyPrefix'

 dct.Value AS DonorfyLotteryCancelledTag,
 dlwt.Value AS DonorfyLotteryWinnerTag,
 dlset.Value AS DonorfyLotterySelfExcludeTag
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dltc
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dat 
  ON dat.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dat.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dat.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryActiveTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dct 
  ON dct.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dct.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dct.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryCancelledTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dlwt 
  ON dlwt.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dlwt.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dlwt.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryWinnerTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dlset 
  ON dlset.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dlset.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dlset.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotterySelfExcludeTag'
  WHERE dltc.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND dltc.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND dltc.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryTagCategory'

SELECT ddr.[Value] AS DonorfyDeceasedReason,
    dgar.[Value] AS DonorfyGoneAwayReason
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] ddr
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dgar 
  ON dgar.TenantCode = ddr.TenantCode
  AND dgar.IntegrationName = ddr.IntegrationName
  AND dgar.[Key] = 'DonorfyGoneAwayReason'
  WHERE ddr.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND ddr.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND ddr.[Key] = 'DonorfyDeceasedReason'

SELECT ba.[Value] AS DonorfyBankAccount,
    f.[Value] AS DonorfyFund,
    pm.[Value] As DonorfyDefaultPaymentMethod,
    dd.[Value] As DonorfyDepartment
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] ba
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] f 
  ON f.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND f.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND f.[Key] = 'DonorfyFund'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] pm 
  ON pm.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND pm.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND pm.[Key] = 'DonorfyDefaultPaymentMethod'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dd 
  ON dd.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND dd.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND dd.[Key] = 'DonorfyDepartment'
  WHERE ba.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND ba.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND ba.[Key] = 'DonorfyBankAccount'

SELECT un.[Value] AS APIUserName, ak.[Value] as APIAccessKey
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] un
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] ak
  ON ak.TenantCode = un.TenantCode
  AND ak.IntegrationName = un.IntegrationName
  AND ak.[Key] = 'APIAccessKey'
  WHERE un.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND un.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND un.[Key] = 'APIUserName'

SELECT lp.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryPurpose,
  lc.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryCampaign,
  lpr.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryProduct,
  kp.[Value] AS DonorfyKeyPrefix,
  dpr.[Value] AS DonorfyDonationProduct
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lp
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lc
  ON  lc.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND lc.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND lc.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryCampaign'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] lpr
  ON  lpr.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND lpr.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND lpr.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryProduct'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dpr
  ON  dpr.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND dpr.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND dpr.[Key] = 'DonorfyDonationProduct'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] kp
  ON  kp.TenantCode = lp.TenantCode
  AND kp.IntegrationName = lp.IntegrationName
  AND kp.[Key] = 'DonorfyKeyPrefix'
  WHERE lp.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND lp.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND lp.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryPurpose'

SELECT dltc.[Value] AS DonorfyLotteryTagCategory,
 dat.Value AS DonorfyLotteryActiveTag,
 dct.Value AS DonorfyLotteryCancelledTag,
 dlwt.Value AS DonorfyLotteryWinnerTag,
 dlset.Value AS DonorfyLotterySelfExcludeTag
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dltc
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dat 
  ON dat.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dat.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dat.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryActiveTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dct 
  ON dct.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dct.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dct.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryCancelledTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dlwt 
  ON dlwt.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dlwt.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dlwt.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryWinnerTag'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dlset 
  ON dlset.TenantCode = dltc.TenantCode
  AND dlset.IntegrationName = dltc.IntegrationName
  AND dlset.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotterySelfExcludeTag'
  WHERE dltc.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND dltc.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND dltc.[Key] = 'DonorfyLotteryTagCategory'

SELECT ddr.[Value] AS DonorfyDeceasedReason,
    dgar.[Value] AS DonorfyGoneAwayReason
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] ddr
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dgar 
  ON dgar.TenantCode = ddr.TenantCode
  AND dgar.IntegrationName = ddr.IntegrationName
  AND dgar.[Key] = 'DonorfyGoneAwayReason'
  WHERE ddr.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND ddr.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND ddr.[Key] = 'DonorfyDeceasedReason'

SELECT ba.[Value] AS DonorfyBankAccount,
    f.[Value] AS DonorfyFund,
    pm.[Value] As DonorfyDefaultPaymentMethod,
    dd.[Value] As DonorfyDepartment
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] ba
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] f 
  ON f.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND f.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND f.[Key] = 'DonorfyFund'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] pm 
  ON pm.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND pm.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND pm.[Key] = 'DonorfyDefaultPaymentMethod'
  INNER JOIN [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dd 
  ON dd.TenantCode = ba.TenantCode
  AND dd.IntegrationName = ba.IntegrationName
  AND dd.[Key] = 'DonorfyDepartment'
  WHERE ba.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND ba.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND ba.[Key] = 'DonorfyBankAccount'

SELECT dm.[Value] AS DonorfyGADDeclarationMethod
  FROM [integration].[IntegrationImportSettings] dm
  WHERE dm.TenantCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.TenantCode}'
  AND dm.IntegrationName = '@{pipeline().parameters.IntegrationName}'
  AND dm.[Key] = 'DonorfyGADDeclarationMethod'
